front: What do the clusters in the Ramachandran plot indicate about the structural regions of hemoglobin?
back: The clusters indicate that most of the amino acids have right handed alpha helical structure.

front: How does the flexibility of glycine affect its Ramachandran plot distribution?
back: It results in all four quadrants of the Ramachandran plots being allowed for glycine.

front: Compare the secondary structure coloring to the Ramachandran plot. Does the plot confirm the structural arrangement of helices and sheets in hemoglobin?
